description.plain:
Nicky Jam is a singer-songwriter born in Lawrence, Massachusetts, currently based in Medellín, Colombia. He first ignited his reggaeton career in the early aughts, gaining recognition for his features on Daddy Yankee songs like “Entre Sábanas Blancas” and “Guayando.”

Unfortunately, Jam’s music career was put on hold after developing addiction issues and splitting with his former mentor, Daddy Yankee. But he’s successfully returned to the spotlight over the past few years, releasing Fénix in 2017—his first full-length album in a decade.

In 2015, Jam and Spanish singer Enrique Iglesias won the Latin Grammy Award for Best Urban Fusion/Performance for their song “El Perdón.”

Jam is close friends with J Balvin, who he also frequently collaborates with.  In 2018, they garnered another hit with their song “X” that crossed over to the Billboard Hot 100 charts.

Nicky Jam is a singer-songwriter born in Lawrence, Massachusetts, currently based in Medellín, Colombia. He first ignited his reggaeton career in the early aughts, gaining recognition for his features on Daddy Yankee songs like “Entre Sábanas Blancas” and “Guayando.”

Unfortunately, Jam’s music career was put on hold after developing addiction issues and splitting with his former mentor, Daddy Yankee. But he’s successfully returned to the spotlight over the past few years, releasing Fénix in 2017—his first full-length album in a decade.

In 2015, Jam and Spanish singer Enrique Iglesias won the Latin Grammy Award for Best Urban Fusion/Performance for their song “El Perdón.”

Jam is close friends with J Balvin, who he also frequently collaborates with.  In 2018, they garnered another hit with their song “X” that crossed over to the Billboard Hot 100 charts.

9 ContributorsEl Perdón Lyrics[Letra de "El Perdón"]

Esto te lo tengo que decir
Cuéntame, tu despedida para mí fue dura

Y yo no supe hacerlo así

Te estaba buscando
Por las calles gritando

Te estaba buscando
Por las calles gritando
Como un loco tomando

Dime quién puede ser feliz
Esto no me gusta
Esto no me gusta
Es que yo sin ti, y tú sin mí
Dime quién puede ser feliz
Eso no me gusta
Eso no me gusta

[Coro]
Es que yo sin ti, y tú sin mí
Dime quién puede ser feliz
Esto no me gusta
Esto no me gusta, oh no
Es que yo sin ti, y tú sin mí

Dicen que uno no sabe lo que tiene hasta que lo pierde, pero (Tú sin mí)

songs.full_title: Hasta el Amanecer by Nicky Jam
songs.title: Hasta el Amanecer

description.plain:
“Hasta El Amanecer” es el segundo sencillo del séptimo álbum de estudio de Nicky Jam, Fénix.

Ésta canción se colocó en la primera posición de la lista de Billboard Hot Latin Songs durante 18 semanas intermitentes del 2016. Así mismo, ganó la categoría de Top Latin Song en los Billboard Music Awards de 2017.

A partir de agosto 2017, el vídeo musical de la canción tiene más de 1,2 mil millones de reproducciones en YouTube, situándola entre los cincuenta vídeos más vistos.

  


“Hasta El Amanecer” is the second single from Nicky Jam’s seventh studio album, Fénix.

This song peaked first on Billboard’s Hot Latin Songs list during 18 intermittent weeks in 2016. Likewise, it won the Top Latin Song category at the 2017 Billboard Music Awards

As of August 2017, the song’s music video has more than 1.2 billion views on YouTube, placing it among the fifty most viewed videos.

description.plain: “Live It Up” is the 2018 Fifa World Cup Official Song performed by Will Smith, Nicky Jam & Era Istrefi. Diplo also co-penned the track and produced it.

body.plain: “Live It Up” is the 2018 Fifa World Cup Official Song performed by Will Smith, Nicky Jam & Era Istrefi. Diplo also co-penned the track and produced it.
